{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3641027,"name":"TomThompson","username":"TomThompson","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/t/eb9ed0/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-05-30T17:00:44.994Z","cooked":"

I am looking for a source of cheap but functional old power distribution panels. We have been working on some demo projects using old FRC parts and Arduino. We ran out of old power distribution panels and I can’t justify the cost of a new panel. Let me know if you have some and are willing to part with them.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":12,"updated_at":"2025-05-30T17:00:44.994Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":43,"reads":365,"readers_count":364,"score":288.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":502596,"topic_slug":"old-frc-power-distribution-panels-needed","display_username":"TomThompson","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":13155,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/old-frc-power-distribution-panels-needed/502596/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3641049,"name":"philso","username":"philso","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/p/e68b1a/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-05-30T17:24:07.738Z","cooked":"

You can try ebay

eBay

CTR electronics Power Distribution Panel 217-4244 (14-8068805) | eBay

CTR Electronics. The Power Distribution Panel (PDP) is the latest DC power interface for competition robotics. The PDP uses CAN to connect directly to the roboRIO and allows for individual current monitoring on each channel.

Since your demo projects don’t need to use FRC legal devices, you can try these for applications up to 20A.

amazon.com

Amazon.com: WUPP Boat Marine Fuse Block Panel with LED Warning Indicator...

Buy WUPP Boat Marine Fuse Block Panel with LED Warning Indicator Damp-Proof Cover - 12 Circuits with Negative Bus Fuse Box Holder Screw for Car Marine RV Truck DC 12-24V, Fuses Included: Fuse Boxes - Amazon.com ✓ FREE DELIVERY possible on eligible...

For higher currents you can use this one but the fuses are less common.

https://www.amazon.com/Joinfworld-Distribution-Mini-ANL-Ground-Stereo/dp/B0B3X9TB8G

12 Circuits with Negative Bus Fuse Box Holder Screw for Car Marine RV Truck DC 12-24V, Fuses Included : Automotive","clicks":16},{"url":"https://www.amazon.com/Joinfworld-Distribution-Mini-ANL-Ground-Stereo/dp/B0B3X9TB8G","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Amazon.com: Joinfworld Fused Power Distribution Block Car Audio 4 Way MIDI(Mini-ANL) Fuse Block 12V 0/4 Gauge with Ground for Auto UTV Boat Stereo Amp : Electronics","clicks":15}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":15467,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/old-frc-power-distribution-panels-needed/502596/2","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3641152,"name":"TomThompson","username":"TomThompson","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/t/eb9ed0/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-05-30T19:42:25.201Z","cooked":"

Thank you. I did do a search on Ebay but apparently wasn’t searching for the right things since I mostly found new modules that were listed for around $200. I will check into the examples you found. The projects do incorporate CIM motors on large (FRC size) robots. I think what I used before were some panels from robots we built in the early 2000’s.

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":12,"updated_at":"2025-05-30T19:42:25.201Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":271,"readers_count":270,"score":59.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":502596,"topic_slug":"old-frc-power-distribution-panels-needed","display_username":"TomThompson","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":15467,"username":"philso","name":"philso","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/p/e68b1a/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":13155,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/old-frc-power-distribution-panels-needed/502596/3","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3641170,"name":"philso","username":"philso","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/p/e68b1a/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-05-30T20:06:24.217Z","cooked":"

If you are using CIM motors, you are better off using the second one from Amazon. I just noticed that it is meant to work with 8-4 AWG wires. You may want to crimp a ring lug onto the motor controller wires so it is easier for the screws in the power distribution panel to grab onto them.

For your low power connections, you can use one of these smaller ones. We have used several of these on our competition robots for the last several years. There is also a version that uses push-button connectors.

amazon.com

OONO 16 Amp 2x12 Position Terminal Block Distribution Module for AC DC:...

OONO 16 Amp 2x12 Position Terminal Block Distribution Module for AC DC: Amazon.com: Industrial & Scientific

$10.99

The Red Alliance

14-806880 (Power Distribution Panel 1.0)

Our organization and shop is dedicated to helping FIRST Robotics Competition (FRC) teams by offering new or slightly used components, tools and other items that FRC Teams need to compete in the FRC Program.

Price: USD 0.00
